content.en: Fashion AI: Researchers have been exploring the use of artificial intelligence (AI) algorithms in the field of fashion. They have developed systems that can automatically compose fashion outfits, retrieve aesthetically similar fashion items, classify fashion product features, analyze fashion trends, and even assist fashion designers in decision-making. These algorithms use techniques such as deep learning, computer vision, and machine learning to analyze fashion data and provide valuable insights to the fashion industry.
content.da: Mode AI: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af kunstig intelligens (AI) algoritmer inden for mode. De har udviklet systemer, der automatisk kan sammensætte tøjoutfits, finde æstetisk lignende modeartikler, klassificere modeteg og analysere modetrends og endda assistere modedesignere i beslutningstagning. Disse algoritmer anvender teknikker såsom dyb læring, computer vision og maskinlæring til at analysere modedata og give værdifuld indsigt til modeindustrien.
